Name: Club Megasaray
Description: Constructed on an area measuring 120,000 m2, this spacious 5-star holiday village has an Ottoman-Selcuk architectural style and is ideal for families with children. The complex consists of a main building and 2-3 floored club buildings. Located close to Belek on Turkey's Mediterranean coast, the complex features a large sandy beach with a sun-bathing jetty. Public transport and a taxi rank are available at the hotel entrance. For golf lovers there is a golf course opposite the hotel. (Some facilities may not be operational year round due to weather/seasonal conditions).

Facilities.Name: Green Key – Foundation for Environmental Education (FEE)
All inclusive with alcoholic drinks own brands
